segments.text: I'd like to have these shirts washed and ironed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , do you want us to use starch ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , heavy starch in the collar , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . Your shirts will be ready by Thursday morning . Anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also have a suit to be dry-cleaned . Can I fetch it the day after tomorrow ? It's urgent .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you please tell me when your laundry opens and closes ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We remain open from 9am till 8p m .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is your laundry ticket , sir .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I'd like to get my laundry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . May I have your laundry ticket , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here you are .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they are ready to go .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you sew on these buttons ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How much for the shirts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 10 dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is the money , keep the change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , bye .
segments.speaker: S2
